20110105190006.000|20110105190008.000|CC1|CONGRESS FROM EITHER SIDE OF THE
20110105190008.000|20110105190010.000|CC1|ISLE AS TO WHETHER IT CREATES   
20110105190010.000|20110105190012.000|CC1|JOBS, STRENGTHENS THE MIDDLE    
20110105190012.000|20110105190015.000|CC1|CLASS, AND REDUCES THE DEFICIT. 
20110105190015.000|20110105190016.000|CC1|NOT BURDENING FUTURE            
20110105190016.000|20110105190020.000|CC1|GENERATIONS.

20110105190159.000|20110105190201.000|CC1|CONFERENCE AND THE RESPECT OF

20110105190203.000|20110105190215.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]

20110105190221.000|20110105190224.000|CC1|FAITH IN HIS FAMILY.

20110105190733.000|20110105190751.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]

20110105190753.000|20110105190755.000|CC1|INTO A SEASON OF SERVICE BY     
20110105190755.000|20110105190758.000|CC1|HAVING ASHES MARKED ON OUR HEAD.
20110105190758.000|20110105190801.000|CC1|THE ASHES REMIND US THAT LIFE IN
20110105190801.000|20110105190804.000|CC1|ALL OF ITS FORMS IS VERY        
20110105190804.000|20110105190804.000|CC1|FRAGILE.                        
20110105190804.000|20110105190805.000|CC1|OUR TIME ON THIS EARTH,         
20110105190805.000|20110105190807.000|CC1|FLEETING.                       
20110105190807.000|20110105190809.000|CC1|BUT AS THE ASHES ARE DELIVERED, 
20110105190809.000|20110105190812.000|CC1|WE HEAR OF THOSE HUMBLING WORDS.
20110105190812.000|20110105190814.000|CC1|REMEMBER, YOU ARE DUST AND TO   
20110105190814.000|20110105190817.000|CC1|DUST YOU SHALL RETURN.

20110105190820.000|20110105190820.000|CC1|US.

20110105190822.000|20110105190823.000|CC1|TO JUST HOW TEMPORARY THE       
20110105190823.000|20110105190825.000|CC1|PRIVILEGE OF SERVING IS.        
20110105190825.000|20110105190828.000|CC1|THEY HAVE REMINDED US THAT      
20110105190828.000|20110105190829.000|CC1|EVERYTHING HERE IS ON LOAN FROM 
20110105190829.000|20110105190831.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110105190831.000|20110105190834.000|CC1|THAT INCLUDES THIS GAVEL.       
20110105190834.000|20110105190837.000|CC1|WHICH I ACCEPT CHEERFULLY AND   
20110105190837.000|20110105190839.000|CC1|GREATFULLY, KNOWING THAT I AM   
20110105190839.000|20110105190841.000|CC1|BUT ITS CARE-TAKER.             
20110105190841.000|20110105190842.000|CC1|AFTER ALL, THIS IS THE PEOPLE'S 
20110105190842.000|20110105190843.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105190843.000|20110105190855.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110105190855.000|20110105190857.000|CC1|THIS IS THEIR CONGRESS.         
20110105190857.000|20110105190858.000|CC1|IT'S NOT -- IT'S ABOUT THEM, NOT
20110105190858.000|20110105190901.000|CC1|ABOUT US.                       
20110105190901.000|20110105190902.000|CC1|WHAT THEY WANT IS A GOVERNMENT  
20110105190902.000|20110105190905.000|CC1|THAT'S HONEST, ACCOUNTABLE, AND 
20110105190905.000|20110105190906.000|CC1|RESPONSIVE TO THEIR NEEDS.      
20110105190906.000|20110105190908.000|CC1|A GOVERNMENT THAT RESPECTS      
20110105190908.000|20110105190911.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL LIBERTY, HONORS OUR  
20110105190911.000|20110105190912.000|CC1|HERITAGE, AND BOWS BEFORE THE   
20110105190912.000|20110105190915.000|CC1|PUBLIC THAT IT SERVES.          
20110105190915.000|20110105190916.000|CC1|LET'S START WITH A RULES PACKAGE
20110105190916.000|20110105190917.000|CC1|THAT THE HOUSE WILL CONSIDER    
20110105190917.000|20110105190919.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110105190919.000|20110105190921.000|CC1|IF PASSED, IT WILL CHANGE HOW   
20110105190921.000|20110105190923.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATES.      
20110105190923.000|20110105190926.000|CC1|WITH AN EMPHASIS ON REAL        
20110105190926.000|20110105190927.000|CC1|TRANSPARENCY, GREATER           
20110105190927.000|20110105190929.000|CC1|ACCOUNTABILITY, AND A RENEWED   
20110105190929.000|20110105190932.000|CC1|FOCUS ON OUR CONSTITUTION.      
20110105190932.000|20110105190933.000|CC1|OUR AIM WILL BE TO GIVE THE     
20110105190933.000|20110105190936.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BACK TO THE AMERICAN 
20110105190936.000|20110105190936.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105190936.000|20110105190938.000|CC1|IN SEEKING THIS GOAL, WE WILL   
20110105190938.000|20110105190940.000|CC1|PART WITH SOME OF THE RITUALS   
20110105190940.000|20110105190943.000|CC1|THAT HAVE COME TO CHARACTERIZE  
20110105190943.000|20110105190944.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION UNDER          
20110105190944.000|20110105190945.000|CC1|MAJORITIES BOTH REPUBLICAN AND  
20110105190945.000|20110105190948.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT ALIKE.                 
20110105190948.000|20110105190950.000|CC1|WE WILL DISPENSE WITH THE       
20110105190950.000|20110105190952.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM THAT BIGGER 
20110105190952.000|20110105190954.000|CC1|BILLS ARE ALWAYS BETTER.        
20110105190954.000|20110105190957.000|CC1|THAT FAST LEGISLATING IS GOOD   
20110105190957.000|20110105190957.000|CC1|LEGISLATING.                    
20110105190957.000|20110105191000.000|CC1|ALLOWING AMENDMENTS AND OPEN    
20110105191000.000|20110105191001.000|CC1|DEBATE MAKES THE LEGISLATIVE    
20110105191001.000|20110105191005.000|CC1|PROCESS LESS EFFICIENT THAN OUR 
20110105191005.000|20110105191006.000|CC1|FOREFATHERS HAD INTENDED.       
20110105191006.000|20110105191007.000|CC1|THESE MISCONCEPTIONS HAVE BEEN  
20110105191007.000|20110105191010.000|CC1|THE BASIS FOR THE RITUALS OF A  
20110105191010.000|20110105191011.000|CC1|MODERN WASHINGTON.              
20110105191011.000|20110105191013.000|CC1|THEY, IN MY OPINION, HAVE NOT   
20110105191013.000|20110105191017.000|CC1|BEEN SERVED WELL TO THE AMERICAN
20110105191017.000|20110105191017.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105191017.000|20110105191019.000|CC1|TODAY, MINDFUL OF THE LESSONS OF
20110105191019.000|20110105191022.000|CC1|THE PAST, WE OPEN A NEW CHAPTER.
20110105191022.000|20110105191024.000|CC1|LEGISLATORS AND THE PUBLIC WILL 
20110105191024.000|20110105191025.000|CC1|HAVE THREE DAYS TO READ A BILL  
20110105191025.000|20110105191028.000|CC1|BEFORE IT COMES TO A VOTE.      
20110105191028.000|20110105191030.000|CC1|LEGISLATION WILL BE MORE        
20110105191030.000|20110105191032.000|CC1|FOCUSED, PROPERLY SCRUTINIZED   
20110105191032.000|20110105191034.000|CC1|AND CONSTITUTIONALLY SOUND.     
20110105191034.000|20110105191036.000|CC1|COMMITTEES ONCE BLOATED WILL BE 
20110105191036.000|20110105191039.000|CC1|SMALLER WITH A RENEWED MISSION  
20110105191039.000|20110105191040.000|CC1|INCLUDING OVERSIGHT.            
20110105191040.000|20110105191042.000|CC1|OLD RULES THAT HAVE MADE IT EASY
20110105191042.000|20110105191045.000|CC1|TO INCREASE SPENDING WILL BE    
20110105191045.000|20110105191046.000|CC1|REPLACED BY NEW REFORMS THAT    
20110105191046.000|20110105191048.000|CC1|MAKE IT EASIER TO CUT SPENDING. 
20110105191048.000|20110105191050.000|CC1|WE WILL START BY CUTTING        
20110105191050.000|20110105191050.000|CC1|CONGRESS' OWN BUDGET.           
20110105191050.000|20110105191110.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110105191110.000|20110105191112.000|CC1|BUT ABOVE ALL ELSE, WE WILL     
20110105191112.000|20110105191115.000|CC1|WELCOME THE BATTLE OF IDEAS.    
20110105191115.000|20110105191119.000|CC1|ENCOURAGE IT, ENGAGE IT, OPENLY,
20110105191119.000|20110105191122.000|CC1|HONESTLY, AND RESPECTFULLY.     
20110105191122.000|20110105191124.000|CC1|AS THE CHAMBER CLOSEST TO THE   
20110105191124.000|20110105191126.000|CC1|PEOPLE, THE HOUSE WORKS BEST    
20110105191126.000|20110105191127.000|CC1|WHEN IT IS ALLOWED TO WORK ITS  
20110105191127.000|20110105191128.000|CC1|WILL.                           
20110105191128.000|20110105191130.000|CC1|AND I ASK MEMBERS OF THIS BODY  
20110105191130.000|20110105191132.000|CC1|TO JOIN ME IN RECOGNIZING THIS  
20110105191132.000|20110105191134.000|CC1|COMMON TRUTH.                   
20110105191134.000|20110105191135.000|CC1|TO MY COLLEAGUES IN THE         
20110105191135.000|20110105191138.000|CC1|MAJORITY, MY MESSAGE IS THIS.   
20110105191138.000|20110105191141.000|CC1|WE WILL HONOR OUR PLEDGE TO     
20110105191141.000|20110105191143.000|CC1|AMERICA BUILT ON A PROCESS OF   
20110105191143.000|20110105191144.000|CC1|LISTENING TO THE AMERICAN       
20110105191144.000|20110105191145.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110105191145.000|20110105191147.000|CC1|WE WILL STAND FIRM ON OUR       
20110105191147.000|20110105191149.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONAL PRINCIPLES THAT  
20110105191149.000|20110105191149.000|CC1|BUILT OUR PARTY AND BUILT THE   
20110105191149.000|20110105191152.000|CC1|GREAT NATION.                   
20110105191152.000|20110105191154.000|CC1|WE WILL DO THESE THINGS,        
20110105191154.000|20110105191155.000|CC1|HOWEVER, IN A MANNER THAT       
20110105191155.000|20110105191157.000|CC1|RESTORES AND RESPECTS THE       
20110105191157.000|20110105191200.000|CC1|TIME-HONORED RIGHT OF THE       
20110105191200.000|20110105191201.000|CC1|MINORITY TO AN HONEST DEBATE, A 
20110105191201.000|20110105191203.000|CC1|FAIR AND OPEN PROCESS.          
20110105191203.000|20110105191205.000|CC1|AND TO ME FRIENDS IN THE        
20110105191205.000|20110105191209.000|CC1|MINORITY, I OFFER A COMMITMENT. 
20110105191209.000|20110105191210.000|CC1|OPENNESS.                       
20110105191210.000|20110105191211.000|CC1|ONCE A TRADITION OF THIS        
20110105191211.000|20110105191213.000|CC1|INSTITUTION, BUT INCREASINGLY   
20110105191213.000|20110105191214.000|CC1|SCARCE IN RECENT DECADES WILL BE
20110105191214.000|20110105191217.000|CC1|THE NEW STANDARD.               
20110105191217.000|20110105191218.000|CC1|THERE WERE NO OPEN RULES IN THE 
20110105191218.000|20110105191221.000|CC1|HOUSE IN THE LAST CONGRESS.     
20110105191221.000|20110105191224.000|CC1|IN THIS ONE, THERE WILL BE MANY.
20110105191224.000|20110105191226.000|CC1|WITH RESTORED OPENNESS, HOWEVER,
20110105191226.000|20110105191229.000|CC1|COMES A RESTORED RESPONSIBILITY.
20110105191229.000|20110105191231.000|CC1|YOU WILL NOT HAVE THE RIGHT TO  
20110105191231.000|20110105191232.000|CC1|WILLFULLY DISRUPT THE           
20110105191232.000|20110105191233.000|CC1|PROCEEDINGS OF THE PEOPLE'S     
20110105191233.000|20110105191235.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105191235.000|20110105191236.000|CC1|BUT YOU WILL ALWAYS HAVE THE    
20110105191236.000|20110105191238.000|CC1|RIGHT TO A ROBUST DEBATE IN AT  
20110105191238.000|20110105191240.000|CC1|OPEN PROCESS THAT ALLOWS YOU TO 
20110105191240.000|20110105191242.000|CC1|REPRESENT YOUR CONSTITUENTS, TO 
20110105191242.000|20110105191244.000|CC1|MAKE YOUR CASE, OFFER           
20110105191244.000|20110105191245.000|CC1|ALTERNATIVES, AND BE HEARD.     
20110105191245.000|20110105191258.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110105191258.000|20110105191302.000|CC1|IN TIME, I BELIEVE THIS         
20110105191302.000|20110105191303.000|CC1|FRAMEWORK WILL ALLOW THE HOUSE  
20110105191303.000|20110105191304.000|CC1|TO BE A PLACE WHERE THE PEOPLE'S
20110105191304.000|20110105191306.000|CC1|WILL IS DONE.                   
20110105191306.000|20110105191310.000|CC1|IT WILL ALSO, I HOPE, REBUILD   
20110105191310.000|20110105191311.000|CC1|TRUST AMONGST US AND THE PEOPLE 
20110105191311.000|20110105191314.000|CC1|WE SERVE AND IN SO DOING,       
20110105191314.000|20110105191316.000|CC1|PROVIDE A GUIDEPOST FOR THOSE   
20110105191316.000|20110105191316.000|CC1|WHO FOLLOW US IN THE SERVICE OF 
20110105191316.000|20110105191319.000|CC1|OUR NATION.                     
20110105191319.000|20110105191321.000|CC1|TO OUR NEW MEMBERS, DEMOCRAT AND
20110105191321.000|20110105191325.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN ALIKE, AS YOU TAKE   
20110105191325.000|20110105191326.000|CC1|THE OATH TODAY, I KNOW THAT YOU 
20110105191326.000|20110105191328.000|CC1|DO SO MINDFUL OF THIS SHARED    
20110105191328.000|20110105191332.000|CC1|GOAL.                           
20110105191332.000|20110105191333.000|CC1|AND KNOW THAT YOUR CONSTITUENTS 
20110105191333.000|20110105191336.000|CC1|HAVE PLACED MUCH TRUST IN YOU.  
20110105191336.000|20110105191338.000|CC1|AS SPEAKER, I FEEL PART OF MY   
20110105191338.000|20110105191340.000|CC1|JOB IS TO HELP EACH OF YOU DO   
20110105191340.000|20110105191341.000|CC1|YOUR JOB WELL, REGARDLESS OF    
20110105191341.000|20110105191344.000|CC1|YOUR POLITICAL PARTY.           
20110105191344.000|20110105191346.000|CC1|MY HOPE IS THAT EVERY NEW MEMBER
20110105191346.000|20110105191348.000|CC1|AND, INDEED, EVERY MEMBER WILL  
20110105191348.000|20110105191350.000|CC1|BE COMFORTABLE WITH APPROACHING 
20110105191350.000|20110105191350.000|CC1|ME WITH REGARD TO MATTERS OF THE
20110105191350.000|20110105191353.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105191353.000|20110105191355.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT ALWAYS GET IT RIGHT.
20110105191355.000|20110105191356.000|CC1|AND WE WILL NOT ALWAYS AGREE ON 
20110105191356.000|20110105191359.000|CC1|WHAT IS RIGHT.                  
20110105191359.000|20110105191400.000|CC1|THERE'S A GREAT DEAL OF SCAR    
20110105191400.000|20110105191402.000|CC1|TISSUE THAT'S BEEN BUILT UP ON  
20110105191402.000|20110105191403.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES OF THE ISLE.         
20110105191403.000|20110105191405.000|CC1|WE CAN'T IGNORE THAT.           
20110105191405.000|20110105191407.000|CC1|NOR SHOULD WE.                  
20110105191407.000|20110105191408.000|CC1|MY BELIEF HAS ALWAYS BEEN THAT  
20110105191408.000|20110105191412.000|CC1|WE CAN DISAGREE WITHOUT BEING   
20110105191412.000|20110105191412.000|CC1|DISAGREEABLE.                   
20110105191412.000|20110105191414.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY IT'S CRITICAL THAT   
20110105191414.000|20110105191415.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATE IN A   
20110105191415.000|20110105191417.000|CC1|MANNER THAT PERMITS A FREE      
20110105191417.000|20110105191419.000|CC1|EXCHANGE OF IDEAS AND RESOLVES  
20110105191419.000|20110105191422.000|CC1|OUR HONEST DIFFERENCES THROUGH A
20110105191422.000|20110105191426.000|CC1|FAIR DEBATE AND VOTE.           
20110105191426.000|20110105191427.000|CC1|WE MAY HAVE DIFFERENT, SOMETIMES
20110105191427.000|20110105191430.000|CC1|VERY DIFFERENT, IDEAS ABOUT HOW 
20110105191430.000|20110105191432.000|CC1|TO ACHIEVE THE COMMON GOOD.     
20110105191432.000|20110105191436.000|CC1|IT IS WHY WE SERVE.             
20110105191436.000|20110105191437.000|CC1|LET US NOW MOVE FORWARD, HUMBLE 
20110105191437.000|20110105191441.000|CC1|IN OUR DEMEANOR, STEADY IN OUR  
20110105191441.000|20110105191442.000|CC1|PRINCIPLES, DEDICATED TO PROVING
20110105191442.000|20110105191444.000|CC1|WORTHY OF THE TRUST AND         
20110105191444.000|20110105191444.000|CC1|CONFIDENCE THAT HAS BEEN PLACED 
20110105191444.000|20110105191447.000|CC1|IN EACH OF US.                  
20110105191447.000|20110105191452.000|CC1|IF WE BRACE OURSELVES TO DO OUR 
20110105191452.000|20110105191455.000|CC1|DUTY, AND SAY -- DO WHAT WE SAY 
20110105191455.000|20110105191458.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO DO, I DON'T THINK
20110105191458.000|20110105191501.000|CC1|THERE'S ANYTHING THAT WE CAN'T  
20110105191501.000|20110105191501.000|CC1|ACCOMPLISH ON BEHALF OF THE     
20110105191501.000|20110105191505.000|CC1|PEOPLE WE SERVE.                
20110105191505.000|20110105191506.000|CC1|MORE THAN A COUNTRY, AMERICA IS 
20110105191506.000|20110105191510.000|CC1|AN IDEA.                        
20110105191510.000|20110105191513.000|CC1|AND IT'S OUR JOB TO PASS THAT   
20110105191513.000|20110105191517.000|CC1|POSTERITY OF BLESSINGS THAT HAVE
20110105191517.000|20110105191519.000|CC1|BEEN BESTOWED ON US TO THE

20110105191520.000|20110105191522.000|CC1|I WANT TO WISH ALL OF YOU THE   
20110105191522.000|20110105191522.000|CC1|VERY BEST.

20110105191605.000|20110105191608.000|CC1|WHERE -- I AM NOW READY TO TAKE 
20110105191608.000|20110105191612.000|CC1|THE OATH OF OFFICE.             
20110105191612.000|20110105191615.000|CC1|>> I THANK YOU.

20110105191838.000|20110105191841.000|CC1|>> THE 112th CONGRESS IS NOW    
20110105191841.000|20110105191843.000|CC1|FORMALLY SWORN.                 
20110105191843.000|20110105191845.000|CC1|LET'S GO TO CHRIS, I WAS TAKEN

20110105191853.000|20110105191855.000|CC1|OF PUBLIC WILL, TO FOLLOW THE   
20110105191855.000|20110105191856.000|CC1|PUBLIC WILL.                    
20110105191856.000|20110105191858.000|CC1|BUT ALSO THAT PARTICULAR PROMISE
20110105191858.000|20110105191901.000|CC1|TO ALLOW OPPOSITION, TO PLAY ITS
20110105191901.000|20110105191902.000|CC1|HAND HERE.                      
20110105191902.000|20110105191904.000|CC1|IS THAT GOING TO BE CHALLENGED  
20110105191904.000|20110105191907.000|CC1|NOW WITH REGARD TO THEIR        
20110105191907.000|20110105191909.000|CC1|DECISION TO HAVE NO AMENDMENTS

20110105191910.000|20110105191913.000|CC1|REPEAL BILL THAT COMES UP ON THE
20110105191913.000|20110105191914.000|CC1|12th?                           
20110105191914.000|20110105191916.000|CC1|>> I AGREE WITH YOU.            
20110105191916.000|20110105191919.000|CC1|ONE THING THAT STRUCK ME,       
20110105191919.000|20110105191920.000|CC1|HUMILITY.                       
20110105191920.000|20110105191921.000|CC1|I THINK JOHN BOEHNER -- HE WAS  
20110105191921.000|20110105191923.000|CC1|OUSTED FROM LEADERSHIP, NOW BACK
20110105191923.000|20110105191924.000|CC1|AS THE SPEAKER.                 
20110105191924.000|20110105191927.000|CC1|I THINK THIS IS A GUY WHO       
20110105191927.000|20110105191928.000|CC1|UNDERSTANDS -- YOU HEARD HIM SAY
20110105191928.000|20110105191929.000|CC1|IT AGAIN AND AGAIN, THE PEOPLE'S
20110105191929.000|20110105191931.000|CC1|HOUSE.                          
20110105191931.000|20110105191933.000|CC1|WE UNDERSTAND THAT THIS IS      
20110105191933.000|20110105191934.000|CC1|TEMPORARY, THAT WE'RE RENTING   
20110105191934.000|20110105191935.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20110105191935.000|20110105191936.000|CC1|EVERYTHING DESIGNED TO SAY WE   
20110105191936.000|20110105191938.000|CC1|KNOW THAT IT'S NOT ABOUT US.    
20110105191938.000|20110105191940.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT THE AMERICAN PEOPLE. 
20110105191940.000|20110105191941.000|CC1|I THOUGHT THAT WAS A SMART TONE 
20110105191941.000|20110105191942.000|CC1|TO TAKE.                        
20110105191942.000|20110105191944.000|CC1|IT'S REFLECTIVE OF BOEHNER'S    
20110105191944.000|20110105191945.000|CC1|CAREER.                         
20110105191945.000|20110105191947.000|CC1|I WOULD SAY, THESE MOMENTS THAT 
20110105191947.000|20110105191950.000|CC1|WE HAVE, AS I WAS SITTING HERE  
20110105191950.000|20110105191951.000|CC1|WATCHING BOEHNER'S SPEECH, I GOT
20110105191951.000|20110105191954.000|CC1|AN E-MAIL FROM NANCY PELOSI VIA 
20110105191954.000|20110105191955.000|CC1|THE DEMOCRATIC CONGRESSIONAL    
20110105191955.000|20110105191957.000|CC1|CAMPAIGN COMMITTEE SAYING IN A  
20110105191957.000|20110105191958.000|CC1|WEEK FROM NOW, HOUSE REPUBLICANS
20110105191958.000|20110105192000.000|CC1|WILL TRY TO REPEAL THE HEALTH   
20110105192000.000|20110105192000.000|CC1|CARE BILL.                      
20110105192000.000|20110105192001.000|CC1|WE NEED TO RAISE $100,000 TO    
20110105192001.000|20110105192003.000|CC1|FIGHT IT.                       
20110105192003.000|20110105192005.000|CC1|THE TRUTH OF THE MATTER IS THESE
20110105192005.000|20110105192008.000|CC1|ARE NICE MOMENTS.               
20110105192008.000|20110105192012.000|CC1|I LIKE THE KIND OF RITUAL AND   
20110105192012.000|20110105192014.000|CC1|THE INTRICATEACIES OF THE       
20110105192014.000|20110105192017.000|CC1|HAND-OVER OF POWER.             
20110105192017.000|20110105192018.000|CC1|BUT IT'S NOT GOING TO LAST ALL  
20110105192018.000|20110105192019.000|CC1|THAT LONG.                      
20110105192019.000|20110105192021.000|CC1|>> AND LET THE WARS BEGIN.      
20110105192021.000|20110105192022.000|CC1|CHRIS, ONE OF THE THINGS THAT   
20110105192022.000|20110105192024.000|CC1|WE'VE ALL BEEN NOTING HERE IS   
20110105192024.000|20110105192027.000|CC1|THAT IT'S SORT OF A SMALL TOWN, 
20110105192027.000|20110105192027.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF CONGRESS, THE HILL,  
20110105192027.000|20110105192029.000|CC1|HOUSE AND SENATE.               
20110105192029.000|20110105192031.000|CC1|IN A WAY IT WAS VERY INTERESTING
20110105192031.000|20110105192033.000|CC1|TO WATCH JOHN DINGLE, THE DEAN  
20110105192033.000|20110105192036.000|CC1|OF THE HOUSE, 84 YEARS OLD, THE 
20110105192036.000|20110105192037.000|CC1|LONGEST-SERVING MEMBER IN U.S.  
20110105192037.000|20110105192038.000|CC1|HISTORY OF THE HOUSE OF         
20110105192038.000|20110105192040.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES SWEARING IN JOHN
20110105192040.000|20110105192040.000|CC1|BOEHNER.                        
20110105192040.000|20110105192043.000|CC1|THEY'VE WORKED TOGETHER OVER    
20110105192043.000|20110105192045.000|CC1|MORE YEARS THAN HE'S WORKED WITH
20110105192045.000|20110105192047.000|CC1|NANCY PELOSI WHO DENIED HIM THE 
20110105192047.000|20110105192048.000|CC1|CHAIRMANSHIP OF THE COMMITTEE   
20110105192048.000|20110105192049.000|CC1|THAT HE HAD LONG LED.           
20110105192049.000|20110105192050.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20110105192050.000|20110105192051.000|CC1|LOOK, I MEAN, I THINK THIS IS   
20110105192051.000|20110105192053.000|CC1|SOMETHING THAT PEOPLE WHO DON'T 
20110105192053.000|20110105192055.000|CC1|LIVE IN WASHINGTON DON'T GRASP, 
20110105192055.000|20110105192057.000|CC1|WHICH IS ON A DAY-IN AND DAY-OUT
20110105192057.000|20110105192059.000|CC1|BASIS, IT'S NOT NECESSARILY     
20110105192059.000|20110105192100.000|CC1|DAGGERS DRAWN EVERYWHERE.       
20110105192100.000|20110105192102.000|CC1|I REMEMBER WHEN I WAS A YOUNG   
20110105192102.000|20110105192104.000|CC1|REPORTER AND I WENT UP TO SEE   
20110105192104.000|20110105192107.000|CC1|THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE.       
20110105192107.000|20110105192110.000|CC1|IT WAS EITHER A SWEARING-IN OR A
20110105192110.000|20110105192110.000|CC1|VOTE OR SOMETHING.              
20110105192110.000|20110105192112.000|CC1|I WAS ALWAYS SO STRUCK BY HOW   
20110105192112.000|20110105192114.000|CC1|FRIENDLY EVERYONE WAS TO EACH   
20110105192114.000|20110105192114.000|CC1|OTHER.                          
20110105192114.000|20110105192117.000|CC1|YOU'D THINK THAT EVERYBODY HATES
20110105192117.000|20110105192118.000|CC1|ONE ANOTHER.                    
20110105192118.000|20110105192119.000|CC1|THERE IS ILL WILL THAT EXISTS ON
20110105192119.000|20110105192121.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES OF THE ISLE, BUT     
20110105192121.000|20110105192123.000|CC1|THERE IS THAT KIND OF SENSE THAT
20110105192123.000|20110105192125.000|CC1|THE VAST MAJORITY OF THESE      
20110105192125.000|20110105192126.000|CC1|PEOPLE ARE HERE BECAUSE THEY    
20110105192126.000|20110105192127.000|CC1|BELIEVE IN COMMUNITY SERVICE,   
20110105192127.000|20110105192129.000|CC1|THEY BELIEVE IN PUBLIC SERVICE. 
20110105192129.000|20110105192132.000|CC1|IT'S EASY TO LOSE THAT AMONG THE
20110105192132.000|20110105192133.000|CC1|SCANDALS AND THE BACK-BITING,   
20110105192133.000|20110105192136.000|CC1|BUT I WOULDN'T BE DOING THIS IF 
20110105192136.000|20110105192137.000|CC1|WE DIDN'T THINK THAT THE PEOPLE 
20110105192137.000|20110105192139.000|CC1|WE WERE COVERING WERE           
20110105192139.000|20110105192140.000|CC1|ESSENTIALLY HONORABLE PEOPLE    
20110105192140.000|20110105192141.000|CC1|TRYING TO GET THINGS DONE.      
20110105192141.000|20110105192143.000|CC1|DOES IT ALWAYS WORK THAT WAY?   
20110105192143.000|20110105192143.000|CC1|CERTAINLY NOT.                  
20110105192143.000|20110105192145.000|CC1|WILL THE 112th CONGRESS WORK    
20110105192145.000|20110105192146.000|CC1|THAT WAY?                       
20110105192146.000|20110105192147.000|CC1|IT PROBABLY WON'T.              
20110105192147.000|20110105192149.000|CC1|BUT I THINK IT SUGGESTS THAT
